member.name: P:SimpleTcp.TcpServer.IdleClientTimeoutSeconds
member.summary: Maximum amount of time to wait before considering a client idle and disconnecting them. By default, this value is set to 0, which will never disconnect a client due to inactivity. The timeout is reset any time a message is received from a client or a message is sent to a client. For instance, if you set this value to 30, the client will be disconnected if the server has not received a message from the client within 30 seconds or if a message has not been sent to the client in 30 seconds.
